text: The #bridgecollapse in JHB is too awful.Driving along & a bridge falls on your head  thoughts are with families of deceased&those injured.
Trust racist #Afrikaaners to turn the #BridgeCollapse into a race issue and attack transformation.
My prayers go to the families that lost their loved ones in the Grayston  #BridgeCollapse
Big up to Team @CityofJoburgZA of @CllrParksTau with @CityofJoburgEMS & @JMPDSafety & others 4 swift action on #Grayston #BridgeCollapse
@Uber_RSA Respect to @Uber for immediate response to sad tragedy of #BridgeCollapse in Sandton.
If you don't have something to say about the #BridgeCollapse,just keep your racist mouth shut and let peace-keepers do it..STOP RACISM"
Something that should have been a calculated aim turned out to be a #BridgeCollapse, Murray & Roberts.
